articles.title: Lampert, Sears Creditors Gird for Battle Over Recent Asset Sales
articles.description: Sears’ creditors will argue in court whether Lampert stripped assets from a failing business and if the money transferred out of their reach prior to bankruptcy can be recovered.
articles.content: (Bloomberg)—Creditors are sifting through the smoking ruins of Sears Holdings Corp. to question whether any of Eddie Lampert’s deals involving the bankrupt retailer were improper. Lampert, 56, a billionaire who controls nearly half of Sears stock, has had int… [+4983 chars]
